DESCRIPTION: Corruption, tracked in the upper right.
Gain #yCorruption unless this is the first Corrupting card played this combat. NL #yCorruption #b50+/100+/150+/200+: Or the second/third/fourth/fifth.
Increases attack damage taken and deals damage every turn.
Gain #yBlock at the end of your turn.
Gain #yBlock at the end of you turn. Reduced by receiving unblocked attack damage.
Deals damage to you at the end of your turn.
Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply #yAbysstouched.
Small fragment of corrupted Spirestone. Can be used at corrupted Rest Sites.
Whenever you play a card, gain #yBlock.
At the beginning of your turn, gain #b2 #yTemporary #yHP and deal damage to ALL enemies equal the floor number divided by #b4.
Any color other than your character's normal card color.
